The President of Ukraine, Viktor Yanukovych, has signed into law the following legislation: The right to information in Ukraine is governed by the following: Information on an individual (personal data) and information on the state of the environment (environmental information) Information on the state of the environment (environmental information) 1. Legal regime of the information on the state of the environment (environmental information) shall be determined by the laws of Ukraine and international treaties of Ukraine ratified by the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine. 888-282-0476 888-282-0476 Rights and obligations of a journalist, a media employee determined by this Law 1. Rights and obligations of a journalist, a media employee determined by this Law shall apply to foreign journalist and foreign media employees working in Ukraine. The following is a guide to the accreditation of journalists and media employees by public authorities: The following is a guide to the legislation on information 888-282-0476 888-282-0476 888-282-0476 888-282-0476 The President of Ukraine has signed into law the following legislation: Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko has signed into law the following: President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych has signed into law the amendments to the Law of Ukraine “On the Procedure for Covering Activities of Government Authorities and Local Government by Mass Media in Ukraine.”
